message.content:
cs.NE, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.CV 

The paper deals with the development of a new approach for training artificial neural networks using backpropagation. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). The paper also discusses the adjustment of synaptic connections, which falls under the category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). The use of reference inputs and training control signals also suggests the involvement of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.SY (Systems and Control). Finally, the paper also discusses the application of the proposed approach to various types of neural networks, including convolutional neural networks, which falls under the category of cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition).
